data.actual_result: The little blue button is solid blue with no icon.
data.expected_result: The little blue button in the bottom right corner shows an icon to submit.
data.short_description: When you change something on account info the little blue button on the bottom right corner doesn't show anything.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Settings. - Go to My Account - Change something on your account and put password in.
